com.github.rwitzel.streamflyer.regex.addons.tokens

Class Token

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.rwitzel.streamflyer.regex.addons.tokens.Token

  • public class Token
extends Object
    A token that shall be matched via a regular expression in a stream. Each token is associated with a MatchProcessor which defines how a TokenProcessor shall process the matched token.
    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    rwoo

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int capturingGroupCount
      The number of capturing groups that are contained in the regex.
      private MatchProcessor matchProcessor
      This object processes the match if the token is matched.
      private String name
      An ID for the token.
      private String regex
      This regular expression describes how a token can be matched.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Token(String regex)
      This constructor should be used only in tests!
      Token(String name, String regex)
      This token matches the given regex but the match processor does nothing.
      Token(String name, String regex, MatchProcessor matchProcessor)
      This token matches the given regex and the match will be processed with the given MatchProcessor.
      Token(String name, String regex, String replacement)
      This token matches the given regex and replaces the match with the replacement.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCapturingGroupCount() 
      MatchProcessor getMatchProcessor() 
      String getName() 
      String getRegex() 
      String toString() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • name

        private String name
        An ID for the token. The ID shall be unique among all tokens used with the TokenProcessor. Immutable.

      • regex

        private String regex
        This regular expression describes how a token can be matched. Flags should be embedded via EmbeddedFlagUtil. Immutable.

      • capturingGroupCount

        private int capturingGroupCount
        The number of capturing groups that are contained in the regex. Immutable.

        Calculated from regex and saved here to improve the performance of a TokenProcessor.

      • matchProcessor

        private MatchProcessor matchProcessor
        This object processes the match if the token is matched.

    • Constructor Detail

        regex - The regex describes how a token can be matched. Embed flags via EmbeddedFlagUtil.
